about_the_game:
Set sail on an unforgettable journey across the vast expanse of the seven seas! In this captivating cooperative sailing game, one player commands the ship, while the other is confined to the captain's cabin, solely navigating with the map. Successfully delivering goods on time will demand the crew's adept communication, skill, and composure.



Experience a unique and fun gameplay dynamic where one player takes the helm as the skilled Sailor, while the other assumes the role of the all-important Cartographer with the knowledge of where to go. Success in this maritime quest hinges on excellent communication and cooperation between both players!
For those seeking a solo expedition, fear not! Engage in a solo mode that allows you to take on the dual responsibility of both Sailor and Cartographer, presenting you with an array of exciting challenges and tasks.



Venture into the unknown waters with each game (around 15 minutes), as a new procedurally generated world unfurls before your eyes. Immerse yourself in several unique biomes, each with its own wonders and challenges. As the Cartographer, you'll face the daunting task of completing the map manually, strategically placing landmarks and ports to chart a course for the Sailor towards your desired destinations.




Embark on a daring mission to deliver vital packages to scattered ports around the world. Beware, though, for the treacherous seas are home to cunning pirates and formidable sea monsters eager to test your mettle. Play with wit and strategy, attempting to steer clear of danger, or embrace bravery and rush in, relying on your cannons to overcome the perils that lie ahead.



In the Same Boat offers a flexible experience that caters to various playstyles. Bask in the tranquil beauty of its worlds as you leisurely explore, or awaken your competitive spirit and strive for greatness. The game features a leaderboard showcasing the fastest completion times for each level, providing an opportunity to leave your mark in the annals of maritime glory. Are you up for the challenge of being the fastest sea dog to sail these perilous waters?
Set sail now and be prepared to forge friendships, overcome challenges, and create lasting memories on this nautical voyage of a lifetime!
